contentData.heading: Where can I buy a new operator from?
contentData.text: It’s simple! Just fill in this form and we’ll connect you with your nearest Automatic Technology supplier to organize a replacement.

contentData.heading: How to fix my unit from beeping and/or flashing.
contentData.text: The most common reason for your operator will beep or flash is because it is due for a scheduled maintenance check. So your garage door is telling you it’s time for a service! Contact your local service representative to arrange.

contentData.heading: Where do I purchase replacement/additional remotes?
contentData.text: You can get in contact with your friendly authorised Automatic Technology dealer to organize a replacement for your remote. Otherwise fill in this form and we will organize one of our team members to send one out to you.

contentData.heading: How to activate or deactivate remotes?
contentData.text: Your user manual will have instructions on how to activate and deactivate your remotes. Click here to view our user manual.

contentData.heading: How do I setup my smartphone control kit?
contentData.text: To set up your smart phone control kit, simply download the app from the Apple app store or Google play store and follow the prompts. Ensure you are connected to a secure Wi-Fi network.
